task: Select an account for the expense record.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when an account is successfully selected and reflected in the AddNewRecord page.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has text "Account:, Cash"

The touch on the button labeled "Account:, Cash" has resulted in the display of a new text view that states "Account" along with a secondary text view that indicates "Long press to modify." Additionally, the text view for "Cash" has been retained, indicating the focus on the account selection. (page changed from AddNewRecord to GeneralSelection)
